name: Cepes Provencale (Sauteed wild mushrooms with garlic)
keywords: dairy-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, wild mushrooms
recipeIngredient: 8 mushrooms, preferably cepes, although shiitake, porcini, Black Forest or other firm mushrooms with round-shaped caps can be used, about 1/2 pound

recipeInstructions.text: Remove and reserve mushrooms stems. Place caps on flat surface and cut each in half, holding knife diagonally and slicing at slight angle. Chop stems.

Heat oil in heavy skillet and add sliced mushroom caps when it is hot and starting to smoke. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook over high heat, stirring and shaking skillet, about 2 minutes or until mushrooms are slightly crisp.
Pour off most of oil and add chopped mushroom stems, bread crumbs and garlic. Cook, stirring, about 1 minute or until crumbs are slightly browned. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve.
